dcterms:description: The Switchboard Dialogue Act Corpus (SwDA) consists of approximately 2,400 two-sided telephone conversations between 543 speakers on about 70 topics. The dataset includes speaker and topic information and has 42 different dialogue acts. It is crucial for capturing global dependencies due to the high amount of backchannels and ambiguous acts.
dcterms:title: SwDA (Switchboard Dialogue Act Corpus)

dcterms:creator: Elizabeth Shriberg
Raj Dhillon
Sonali Bhagat
Jeremy Ang
Hannah Carvey
dcterms:description: The Meeting Recorder Dialogue Act Corpus (MRDA) contains 72 hours of multiparty meetings that have been converted into 75-word conversations and manually annotated with dialogue acts. The dataset includes 5 dialogue acts such as statements, questions, floor grabs, backchannels, and disruptions.
dcterms:title: MRDA (Meeting Recorder Dialogue Act Corpus)
